issues.message: <html> element must have a lang attribute (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/html-has-lang?application=axeAPI)

runnerExtras.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
runnerExtras.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

issues.message: Document must have one main landmark (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/landmark-one-main?application=axeAPI)

runnerExtras.description: Ensures the document has a main landmark
runnerExtras.help: Document must have one main landmark

issues.message: Page must contain a level-one heading (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/page-has-heading-one?application=axeAPI)

runnerExtras.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
runnerExtras.help: Page must contain a level-one heading

issues.message: All page content must be contained by landmarks (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.5/region?application=axeAPI)

runnerExtras.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
runnerExtras.help: All page content must be contained by landmarks
